languages.text: "Теперь, когда мы разобрались с насущными вопросами, будут ли у вас еще какие-либо распоряжения по новым порядкам на станции? Все-таки, вы теперь единоличн{mf|ый|ая} покровитель{mf||ница} Футфола". {n}Владайм и все собравшиеся в кабаке выжидающе смотрят на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Теперь, когда мы разобрались с насущными вопросами, будут ли у вас еще какие-либо распоряжения по новым порядкам на станции? Все-таки, вы теперь единоличн{mf|ый|ая} покровитель{mf||ница} Футфола". {n}Владайм и все собравшиеся в кабаке выжидающе смотрят на вас.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Now that we've dealt with the pressing issues, do you have any other instructions regarding the station's governance going forward? After all, Footfall is now under your exclusive personal protection." {n}Vladaym and everyone in the bar look at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “如今我们已经解决了当务之急，您还有什么其他指示吗？关于这座星站未来的管理风格？毕竟，您现在是落脚港唯一的守护者。”{n}弗拉迪姆与酒吧里的每个人都满怀期待地看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now that we've dealt with the pressing issues, do you have any other instructions regarding the station's governance going forward? After all, Footfall is now under your exclusive personal protection." {n}Vladaym and everyone in the bar look at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如今我们已经解决了当务之急，您还有什么其他指示吗？关于这座星站未来的管理风格？毕竟，您已经是落脚港唯一的守护者么。”{n}弗拉迪姆与酒吧里的每个人都满怀期待地看着你。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「緊急事態も対応したところだし、ステーションの今後の統治について他に指示はあるか？これからのフットフォールは、君の個人的な保護下に置かれる」{n}ヴラダイムを含むバーにいる全員は、期待の眼差しであなたを見た。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now that we've dealt with the pressing issues, do you have any other instructions regarding the station's governance going forward? After all, Footfall is now under your exclusive personal protection." {n}Vladaym and everyone in the bar look at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「緊急事態も対応したところだし、ステーションの今後の統治について他に指示はあるか？これからのフットフォールは、君の個人的な保護下に置かれる」{n}ヴラダイムを含むバーにいる全員は、期待の眼差しであなたを見た。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Ahora que nos hemos ocupado de los asuntos urgentes, ¿tiene alguna otra instrucción respecto al gobierno de la estación? Al fin y al cabo, Paso está ahora bajo su protección». {n}Vladaym y el resto de personas del bar te miran expectantes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now that we've dealt with the pressing issues, do you have any other instructions regarding the station's governance going forward? After all, Footfall is now under your exclusive personal protection." {n}Vladaym and everyone in the bar look at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ahora que nos hemos ocupado de los asuntos urgentes, ¿tiene alguna otra instrucción respecto al gobierno de la estación? Al fin y al cabo, Paso está ahora bajo su protección». {n}Vladaym y el resto de personas de la taberna te miran expectantes.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Nachdem wir uns nun um die dringenden Angelegenheiten gekümmert haben, habt Ihr noch andere Anweisungen, was die Führung der Station in Zukunft angeht? Schließlich steht Footfall jetzt unter Eurem exklusiven persönlichen Schutz." {n}Vladaym und alle anderen in der Bar sehen dich erwartungsvoll an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now that we've dealt with the pressing issues, do you have any other instructions regarding the station's governance going forward? After all, Footfall is now under your exclusive personal protection." {n}Vladaym and everyone in the bar look at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nachdem wir uns nun um die dringenden Angelegenheiten gekümmert haben, habt Ihr noch andere Anweisungen, was die Führung der Station in Zukunft angeht? Schließlich steht Footfall jetzt unter Eurem exklusiven persönlichen Schutz." {n}Vladaym und alle anderen in der Bar sehen dich erwartungsvoll an.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Bien, maintenant que nous avons réglé les problèmes urgents, avez-vous d'autres instructions concernant le gouvernement de la station ? Après tout, Castel est maintenant sous votre protection exclusive. » {n}Vladaym et toute l'assemblée vous regardent silencieusement en attendant votre réponse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now that we've dealt with the pressing issues, do you have any other instructions regarding the station's governance going forward? After all, Footfall is now under your exclusive personal protection." {n}Vladaym and everyone in the bar look at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Bien, maintenant que nous avons réglé les problèmes urgents, avez-vous d'autres instructions concernant le gouvernement de la station ? Après tout, Castel est maintenant sous votre protection exclusive. » {n}Vladaym et toute l'assemblée vous regardent silencieusement en attendant votre réponse.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Acil meselelerle ilgilendiğimize göre istasyonun ilerleyen zamanlarda nasıl yönetileceğine dair başka bir talimatınız var mı? Nihayetinde Binliman, artık sizin kişisel korumanız altında." {n}Vladaym ve bardaki herkes sana beklentiyle bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now that we've dealt with the pressing issues, do you have any other instructions regarding the station's governance going forward? After all, Footfall is now under your exclusive personal protection." {n}Vladaym and everyone in the bar look at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Acil meselelerle ilgilendiğimize göre, istasyonun ilerleyen zamanlarda nasıl yönetileceğine dair herhangi başka bir talimatınız var mı? Nihayetinde Binliman artık sizin kişisel korumanız altında." {n}Vladaym ve bardaki herkes sana beklentiyle bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
